attributes.action: Ban dogs from public places, parks… ban dangerous dogs… dogs must be on leads…
attributes.additional_details: It has been way too dangerous for the public to walk safely down the road or in a park without being intimidated by a dog or it’s owner or attacked and in some cases even injured or even causing death. It’s time the government takes serious actions against dogs and it’s owners and bring about new laws that will ensure full safety of the public everywhere at all times.
attributes.background: Ban dogs from public places such as parks beaches and outdoor family recreation areas. Make it illegal to walk dogs without leads and muzzles. Ban all dangerous dogs. Tougher punishments for dog owners who are careless about public safety. Make all dog owners have licenses to own dogs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639062
Lifetime ban on dog ownership for anyone whose dog attacks a person

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644006
Increase punishments for owners in dog attacks
